name: One Shot (BottleKAP)
description:
This game was made for BlackThornProd 2021 game jam #3.

The theme was Less Is More, my game fits the theme by the player having to pick back up bullets that were once shot by the player or enemies. The more bullets your player is carrying the slower your character moves.

This was a solo project so thank you for playing!

If the Web version is not working for you check out the downloadable one down below.
